module.name: fabrication_technology
module.keywords: module, fabrication, technology, parameters, templates, patterns, stackup model

abstract.p: the representation of the information needed to describe the properties of the fabrication technology selected for the interconnect substrate being designed. This part of ISO 10303 also supports description of simple and complex templates for layout design. This part of ISO 10303 also supports definition of technology specific layer stackup models able to support multiple material combinations.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the properties of the fabrication technology selected for the interconnect substrate being designed. This part of ISO 10303 also supports description of simple and complex templates for layout design. This part of ISO 10303 also supports definition of technology specific layer stackup models able to support multiple material combinations.
purpose.note: The stackup model is not limited to one vertical arrangement of material stackup but supports differing material stackup across a substrate.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Constructive solid geometry 2d, ISO/TS 10303-1731;
items within the scope of application module Extended geometric tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1666;
items within the scope of application module Part feature location, ISO/TS 10303-1714;
items within the scope of application module Part template shape with parameters, ISO/TS 10303-1720;
items within the scope of application module Physical layout template, ISO/TS 10303-1722;
items within the scope of application module Requirement decomposition, ISO/TS 10303-1740.
